posts.post_content:
Two lots of T206's.  All cards in these groups have been either trimmed, had color added, or generally in poor condition.  No hidden gems.  They do all present fairly well and for the collector attempting to assimilate quantity this is a perfect opportunity.  Payment by check or money order preferred, paypal is accepted.  Please pm with specific questions.

Lot # 1: NY Giants group of 12 with Donlin $210 delivered

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/myachelydra/forsaleiii/websize/msb%20t206%20lot%20giants.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/myachelydra/forsaleiii/websize/msb%20t206%20Giants%20reverse.jpg[/IMG]

Lot # 2: Buffalo group of 6 $100

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/myachelydra/forsaleiii/websize/msb%20t206%20buffalo.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/myachelydra/forsaleiii/websize/msb%20t206%20buffalo%20reverse.jpg[/IMG]
Price reduced on NY lot to $185 delivered and Buffalo group to $90 delivered prior to eBay.
